00008   Sass_Value* List::construct(const std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> raw_val, Sass_Value **out) {
00009     size_t length = 0;
00010     bool comma = true;
00011 
00012     if (raw_val.size() >= 1) {
00013       if (!raw_val[0]->IsNumber()) {
00014         return fail("First argument should be an integer.", out);
00015       }
00016 
00017       length = Nan::To<uint32_t>(raw_val[0]).FromJust();
00018 
00019       if (raw_val.size() >= 2) {
00020         if (!raw_val[1]->IsBoolean()) {
00021           return fail("Second argument should be a boolean.", out);
00022         }
00023 
00024         comma = Nan::To<bool>(raw_val[1]).FromJust();
00025       }
00026     }
00027 
00028     return *out = sass_make_list(length, comma ? SASS_COMMA : SASS_SPACE);
00029   }

00031   void List::initPrototype(v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> proto) {
00032     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getLength", GetLength);
00033     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getSeparator", GetSeparator);
00034     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setSeparator", SetSeparator);
00035     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getValue", GetValue);
00036     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setValue", SetValue);
00037   }

00039   NAN_METHOD(List::GetValue) {
00040 
00041     if (info.Length() != 1) {
00042       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected just one argument").ToLocalChecked());
00043     }
00044 
00045     if (!info[0]->IsNumber()) {
00046       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied index should be an integer").ToLocalChecked());
00047     }
00048 
00049     Sass_Value* list = unwrap(info.This())->value;
00050     size_t index = Nan::To<uint32_t>(info[0]).FromJust();
00051 
00052 
00053     if (index >= sass_list_get_length(list)) {
00054       return Nan::ThrowRangeError(Nan::New("Out of bound index").ToLocalChecked());
00055     }
00056 
00057     info.GetReturnValue().Set(Factory::create(sass_list_get_value(list, Nan::To<uint32_t>(info[0]).FromJust()))->get_js_object());
00058   }
00059 
00060   NAN_METHOD(List::SetValue) {
00061     if (info.Length() != 2) {
00062       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected two arguments").ToLocalChecked());
00063     }
00064 
00065     if (!info[0]->IsNumber()) {
00066       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied index should be an integer").ToLocalChecked());
00067     }
00068 
00069     if (!info[1]->IsObject()) {
00070       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied value should be a SassValue object").ToLocalChecked());
00071     }
00072 
00073     Value* sass_value = Factory::unwrap(info[1]);
00074     if (sass_value) {
00075       sass_list_set_value(unwrap(info.This())->value, Nan::To<uint32_t>(info[0]).FromJust(), sass_value->get_sass_value());
00076     } else {
00077       Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New<v8::String>("A SassValue is expected as the list item").ToLocalChecked());
00078     }
00079   }
00080 
00081   NAN_METHOD(List::GetSeparator) {
00082     info.GetReturnValue().Set(sass_list_get_separator(unwrap(info.This())->value) == SASS_COMMA);
00083   }
00084 
00085   NAN_METHOD(List::SetSeparator) {
00086     if (info.Length() != 1) {
00087       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected just one argument").ToLocalChecked());
00088     }
00089 
00090     if (!info[0]->IsBoolean()) {
00091       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied value should be a boolean").ToLocalChecked());
00092     }
00093 
00094     sass_list_set_separator(unwrap(info.This())->value, Nan::To<bool>(info[0]).FromJust() ? SASS_COMMA : SASS_SPACE);
00095   }
00096 
00097   NAN_METHOD(List::GetLength) {
00098     info.GetReturnValue().Set(Nan::New<v8::Number>(sass_list_get_length(unwrap(info.This())->value)));
00099   }
